potentiallyDangerousLibraries.name: eval()
potentiallyDangerousLibraries.risk: Executes arbitrary code, allowing attackers to inject malicious scripts

potentiallyDangerousLibraries.name: child_process
potentiallyDangerousLibraries.risk: Spawns external processes, potentially opening security vulnerabilities

potentiallyDangerousLibraries.name: os
potentiallyDangerousLibraries.risk: Provides direct access to operating system functionalities

potentiallyDangerousLibraries.name: shelljs
potentiallyDangerousLibraries.risk: Executes shell commands directly, similar risks to child_process

potentiallyDangerousLibraries.name: request
potentiallyDangerousLibraries.risk: Performs HTTP requests without proper input validation

potentiallyDangerousLibraries.name: fs
potentiallyDangerousLibraries.risk: Provides access to file system operations

potentiallyDangerousLibraries.name: crypto
potentiallyDangerousLibraries.risk: Improper implementation can lead to encryption vulnerabilities

potentiallyDangerousLibraries.name: bodyParser
potentiallyDangerousLibraries.risk: Deprecated and vulnerable to parsing attacks

potentiallyDangerousLibraries.name: debug
potentiallyDangerousLibraries.risk: Debugging information can be leaked through logs
